name: payum/payum
description: Payum offers everything you need to work with payments. From simplest use cases to very advanced ones.

suggest.doctrine/orm: ~2.5 If you want to store models to database using doctrin2 ORM
suggest.doctrine/mongodb-odm: ~1.0 If you want to store models to mongo doctrin2 ODM
suggest.zendframework/zend-db: ~2.0 If you want to store models to Zend Db ORM
suggest.propel/propel1: ~1.7 If you want to store models to Propel1 ORM
suggest.propel/propel: If you want to store models to Propel2 ORM
suggest.symfony/routing: ~2.8|~3.0 If you want to use TokenFactory from symfony's bridge
suggest.symfony/http-kernel: ~2.8|~3.0 If you want to use HttpRequestVerifier from symfony's bridge
suggest.symfony/http-foundation: ~2.8|~3.0 If you want to use HttpRequestVerifier or HttpResponse reply from symfony's bridge
suggest.symfony/form: ~2.8|~3.0 If you want to use forms
suggest.monolog/monolog: ~1.0 If you want to use PSR-3 logger
suggest.authorizenet/authorizenet: ~1.8 If you want to use Authorizenet.NET install authorizenet/authorizenet:~1.8 library
suggest.paypal/rest-api-sdk-php: 0.5.* If you want to use PayPal REST API install paypal/rest-api-sdk-php:0.5.* library
suggest.klarna/checkout: ~1.0|~2.0 If you want to use Klarna Checkout install klarna/checkout:~1|~2.0 library
suggest.fp/klarna-invoice: 0.1.* If you want to use Klarna Invoice install fp/klarna-invoice:0.1.* library
suggest.stripe/stripe-php: ~1.0 If you want to use Stripe install stripe/stripe-php:~1.0 library
suggest.ext-soap: * If you want to use Payex extension you have to install soap extension
